jobDescription: Intuitive is hiring a Data Management Senior Analyst to join our Federal Team in DCDUTIESSupport the Program Management Office (PMO) federal work stream lead(s) as a subject matter expert in data management, providing strategic guidance and deliverables on data cleansing, governance and conversionProvide oversight and review the execution of data-related project work by the contractor teamBrief leadership on data management concepts, opportunities for innovation, risks and toolsCollaborate with various stakeholders on data management activities including data governance steering committees, working groups and business process reengineeringREQUIREDSpecific desired areas of expertise include data cleanse, data governance, lineage, migration and conversionAbility to develop and maintain strong rapport and credibility with client leadership and stakeholder communityUnderstanding of federal financial management and acquisitions concepts, systems, data, and reporting requirements.Experience with financial and/or acquisitions systems implementations, especially in a shared services environment.Detail-oriented consulting approach, with the ability to multi-task across multiple areasProject management and PMO experience, including experience with status assessment, project planning, and project schedulingSignificant experience and deep knowledge of business, functional and technical areas/disciplinesExceptional communication skills and ability to work and analyze both independently and as part of a teamQualifications 10+ years’ experience and a Bachelors’ degree in engineering, accounting, finance, management information systems, or other related fieldDESIREDExperience with CGI’s Momentum® Federal Financials & AcquisitionsExperience in establishing program/project governance processes and facilitating governance boardsExperience working with Federal Shared Service Providers (FSSPs)Certified Government Financial Manager (CGFM)
